## `safira-cli cicd configure`

Help you configure your CI/CD pipeline for your project

```
USAGE
  $ safira-cli cicd configure [--help] [-e <value>] [-u <value>] [-t <value>]

FLAGS
  -e, --email=<value>     email
  -t, --token=<value>     token
  -u, --username=<value>  username
  --help                  Show CLI help.

DESCRIPTION
  Help you configure your CI/CD pipeline for your project

EXAMPLES
  $ safira-cli cicd configure
```
